com.aurel.track.util.emailHandling

Class JavaMailBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.util.emailHandling.JavaMailBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class JavaMailBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class handles the sending of e-mails from the Trackplus system. It requires connection to an SMTP server and possibly to a POP3 server in case of authentication mode "POP3 before SMTP".
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • sendMailInThread

        public void sendMailInThread(java.util.List<TPersonBean> recipients,
                    java.lang.String subject,
                    TPersonBean addressFrom,
                    java.lang.String messageBody,
                    boolean isPlain,
                    java.util.List<LabelValueBean> attachments)
        Send either plain text or HTML e-mail to a list of recipients. Which e-mail type to send is taken from the recipients profile. This is with attachments and callback.
        Parameters:
        recipients - - the list of intended recipients
        subject - - the message subject
        addressFrom - - the sender of the e-mail
        messageBody - - the message body
        attachments - - a list of attachments
